fields.description: The Credit Trade has been created but is only visible to the initiating organization.
The Credit Trade has been created and is visible to both the initiating and responding Fuel Suppliers, and is waiting on the response from the Respondent.
The Credit Trade has been accepted by the Respondent and is waiting on approval by the Director.
The Credit Trade has been has been reviewed by a Government Analyst and is Recommended for Approval  by the Director.
The Credit Trade has been has been reviewed by a Government Analyst and is Not Recommended for Approval by the Director.
The Credit Trade has been has been approved by the Director and will be Completed as soon as the Effective Date of the Credit Trade has been reached.
The Credit Trade has been Completed and the Credit Balance(s) of the Fuel Supplier(s) has been updated.
The Credit Trade has been cancelled by one of the participants in the Credit Trade.
